name: I'm Fine (Phamility)
description:
"I'm Fine" is my submission for the game jam: Spooktober Jam 2020, having the the theme of "Mask the Truth".  This is my first game jam and honestly I have no clue what I'm doing . Also, I'm sorry I couldn't make it a Web5GL game, I tried but Unity had invalid build paths everywhere.

I'm Fine is a small short game with three endings that revolves around the life of a player that you control. You have some small options you can choose but one thing is for sure, your life sucks.

Check out my twitter https://twitter.com/TheAgileIndie !

Credits to Apoxode, Speck, and Airtone for the music
